customer_service.say_hello.name: customer_service.say_hello
patterns: Hi
Hello
Good morning
Good afternoon
Good evening

customer_service.introduction.name: customer_service.introduction
customer_service.introduction.example: What types of products do you offer?
patterns: What types of products do you offer?
Could you tell me about the products you offer?
I'm interested in your products. What can you tell me about them?
Can you provide information about the products you offer?
What kind of products does your company provide?
Do you have a catalog of your products?
I'd like to know more about the products available.
Could you give me an overview of your product range?
What are the main products your company sells?
Can you give me some details about the products you offer?
What sorts of things can I buy from you?
I'm curious about the range of products you have. Can you elaborate?

customer_service.product_details.name: customer_service.product_details
customer_service.product_details.example: Can you tell me more about the specifications of this product?
patterns: Can you tell me more about the specifications of this product?
What are the features of this product?
I need detailed information about this product.
What specifications does this product have?
Can you provide more details about this item?
What are the technical details of this product?
Tell me more about the features of this product.
What are the dimensions and weight of this product?
What materials is this product made of?
Can you describe the functionality of this product?
What kind of warranty does this product have?
Are there any special features of this product?
Can you recommend some product details?

customer_service.shipping.name: customer_service.shipping
patterns: shipping
What are your shipping options?
How long does shipping take?
What is the cost of shipping?
Do you offer free shipping?
Can you ship internationally?
What shipping methods do you use?
How can I track my order?
What is the delivery time for this product?
Can I expedite my shipping?
What countries do you ship to?
What are the shipping rates?
Do you provide tracking numbers for shipments?

customer_service.returns.name: customer_service.returns
patterns: What is your return policy?
Can I return this product?
How do I return an item?
What is the process for returning a product?
Are there any return fees?
What is your exchange policy?
How long do I have to return an item?
Can I get a refund for this product?
What conditions apply to returns?
Do I need a receipt to return an item?
How can I exchange a product?
What is the procedure for returning a defective item?

customer_service.support.name: customer_service.support
customer_service.support.example: I need help with my order.
patterns: I need help with my order.
Can you assist me with an issue?
How can I contact customer support?
I have a problem with my purchase.
Can you help me with a product issue?
Where can I get technical support?
I need assistance with my account.
Can you provide support for this product?
How do I get in touch with customer service?
I have a question about my order.
What should I do if I encounter a problem?
How can I get help with a technical issue?

customer_service.say_goodbye.name: customer_service.say_goodbye
patterns: Goodbye
Bye
See you later
Take care
Have a great day
Farewell
Talk to you soon
Catch you later
See you next time
Thanks, goodbye
It was nice talking to you, bye
Goodbye for now
